title: Why do some local people insist on pronouncing Camp LeJeune as \Camp LeJern\"? There is no \'R\" anywhere to be found in this word. Other military installations that I\'ve been sent to have always said \"Camp Le-zhoon\" when referencing this great base and \'Le-zhoon\' is the correct French pronunciation since it is a French name. One local TV station in particular repeatedly says \'LeJern\' which sounds very \'hickish\' and reflects poorly on our area."
